name: Unfinished Side Project
description:
This game, despite its name isn't actually an Unfinished Side Project, but rather an entry to the B3AGZ Jam 2023. In this game, you play the role of a play tester helping the narrator by testing his game. Can you beat all five levels and claim the prize?

The theme of the jam was "There is no spoon", a quote from the matrix about the world not being what it seems like. I've reflected this in my game by making a box that disappears when you're not looking at it.

This game has several accessibility options, including subtitles and color correction, and additionally there is gamepad support, though that hasn't been tested and is not officially supported.

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Sprint: Left Shift
Jump: Spacebar
Interact: Left Mouse Button
